candidate Profile Description.summary: Computer science engineering student, specializing in data science. Passionate about applying computer science and data science to solve real-world problems and create innovative solutions. My goal is to continue developing my skills and working on challenging projects.

experience.title: Data science Intern (Remote)
experience.description: Collection of labeled images data, implementation of StackGAN model, conducting of image preprocessing and implementation of StableDiffusion.
experience.tools: Python, Web Scraping, StackGAN, StableDiffusion, PyTorch

experience.title: Data Analytic Intern
experience.description: Engineering of scripts to extract important information from various scanned PDF files.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Development of a Mobile Application for the management of world's events using Android Studio.

projects.name: CareerCenter
projects.description: Developed a web platform, CareerCenter, facilitating the management and matching of job offers and candidates. Engineered scripts to extract candidates data from LinkedIn and CV. Implemented a script for extracting job offers' information from PDFs. Optimized matching through word embedding and cosine similarity metrics. Extracted KPIs and crafted a PowerBI dashboard for insightful analytics. Deployed the system as a web application.
projects.tools: Python, Web scraping, OCR, NLP, NER, Word embedding, PowerBi, Django

projects.name: YogaPoseDetec
projects.description: Developed and deployed a machine learning application to detect and classify yoga poses. Conducted data preprocessing and implemented various image recognition models. Compared models and deployed the most effective one in a web application.
projects.tools: Python, TensorFlow, CNN, VGG16, Flask, Movenet
